channel.title: Comments on: Canadian Greetings to World

item.title: By: Maureen McIlwain, Toronto ON, Canada
item.dc:creator: Maureen McIlwain, Toronto ON, Canada
item.description: This is a rather belated reply to this kind post for Canada Day. July has been very busy for me. Thanks Susan - lovely little rug and also for including the info about our flag. Just a baby, compared to yours!
item.content:encoded: This is a rather belated reply to this kind post for Canada Day. July has been very busy for me. Thanks Susan – lovely little rug and also for including the info about our flag. Just a baby, compared to yours!
